kabbalatShabbat.description: Join us for Kabbalat Shabbat at <TIME>

themes.theme: When a month has five Shabbats, we celebrate the last one at Harlem Hops

saturdayMorning.title: Saturday Morning Services
saturdayMorning.description: Join us every Saturday at 9am for Torah learning, coffee, and treats followed by Shacharit at 9:30am. Torah reading and musaf will be preceded by first kiddush at 10:15am and followed by second kiddush around 12:30pm. Torah reading is open to community members of any gender identity to read.

kidzShabbat.title: Kidz Shabbat
kidzShabbat.description: We celebrate Shabbat together with children's services on the first Shabbat of every month.
